Posts.Content: Mar 13, 2018 07:11PM BirthGiver wrote: I just had my surgery today. Praying & trusting it will still come back benign. But this is all too scary. Surgery was on the right breast but I feel uncomfortable on my left breast. My initial mammo didn't find anything on my left. Which I'm glad but worriessome. Now the wait for my follow up. Sorry if this is not encouraging to you but I just needed to express my thoughts.
Posts.Title: Diagnosed with Radial scar, i.e. CSL. Now what? Cheyenne01 Mechq
